page.title: 07TRELLECH SCHOOLS HEADTEACHER
page.content: THE HEADTEACHER OF TRELLECH SCHOOL IS MR. ROWLANDS. HE TRAVELS 9 MILES FROM SHIRENEWTON. HE USED TO BE A DEPUTY HEAD OF A BIG SCHOOL NEAR NEWPORT. HE HAS BEEN HEADTEACHER HERE SINCE MAY 1982. AS A HEAD TEACHER HE HAS TO ORDER STATIONARY BOOKS, PLAN THE CURRRICULUM, DEAL WITH WAGE FORMS, WRITE LETTERS, MEET GOVERNORS, AND ADVISERS, KEEP THE STOCK UP TO DATE AND DEAL WITH VISITORS. AS A CLASS TEACHER HE TEACHES ALL THE JUNIORS WHOSE AGE RANGE FROM 7 TO 11. THIS YEAR HE HAS 20 CHILDREN AND HE TAKES THEM FOR EVERY SUBJECT EXCEPT MUSIC. THIS YEAR HE HAS HELPED THEM WITH A LOCAL HISTORY TRAIL. HE PARTICULARLY ENJOYS THE ANTHOLOGY OF POETRY 'CALENDAR OF COLOURS' THAT WE ARE DOING THIS YEAR.
